item.title: Make skill cape go up 1 lvl?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:9, topic:171679”]Um you can try this lol find public boolean wear and in there add
if(wearID == ####){//attack cape
playerLevel[0] += 1;//attack skill
}
and in method remove, add
if(wearID == ####){//attack cape
playerLevel[0] -= 1;//attack skill
}

Not sure if that will work it should though (typed it in the quick message box lol)[/quote]

that will work you will just have to add refreshSkills(); or the skill will go up, but it will not change the number on their skill interface.

Read full topic

item.source: Make skill cape go up 1 lvl?

item.title: Make skill cape go up 1 lvl?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

in boolean process

if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == (attack cape ID)) {
isWearingAttack = true;
} else if(playerEquipment[playerCape] != (attack cape ID)) {
isWearingAttack = false;
}

if(isWearingAttack && !hadAttackBoost) {
playerLevel[0] += 1;
hadAttackBoost = true;
hadAttackBoost2 = false;
refreshSkills();
} else if(!isWearingAttack && !hadAttackBoost2) {
hadAttackBoost2 = true;
playerLevel[0] -= 1;
refreshSkills();
}

then add

boolean hadAttackBoost = false;
boolean hadAttackBoost2 = true;
boolean isWearingAttack = false;

and that should work.

Read full topic
